# Apple Cobbler

## Ingredients

* 4 cups sliced apples (about 4 medium apples)
* 0.33 cups brown sugar
* 0.5 cups flour
* 0.5 cups oats
* 0.75 tsp cinnamon
* 0.75 tsp nutmeg
* 0.33 cup margarine

## Instructions

Heat evon to 375&deg;F. Grease an 8x8x2 inch pan. Place apples in the pan. Mix remaining ingredients and sprinkel over apples. Bake 30 min. Serve warm or cold.
